org.cougaar.bootstrap
Class BootstrapClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          org.cougaar.bootstrap.XURLClassLoader
              org.cougaar.bootstrap.BootstrapClassLoader

public class BootstrapClassLoader
extends XURLClassLoader

A Classloader which uses slightly different rules for class loading: Prefer classes loaded via this loader rather than the parent.
